questions.question: This arc features a battle on an island with a giant tree, where Luffy and crew face off against a Warlord of the Sea and a corrupt king. What is...?
This arc focuses on the backstory of Sanji and his connections to the Vinsmoke Family. What is...?
This arc takes place on an archipelago near the Red Line and features the separation of the Straw Hat crew. What is...?
Rarely seen and highly respected, this form of Haki allows its user to exert their willpower over others, knocking out those with weaker wills. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to transform into a dragon or a dragon-like creature. What is...?
questions.answer: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu

questions.question: This ability, showcased by a Straw Hat crew member, grants the power to manipulate and become sand. What is...?
This commander of the Revolutionary Army's eastern forces is known for her ability to turn her body into art. Who is...?
This character, known for their Straw Hat, is the captain of the Straw Hat Pirates and dreams of becoming the Pirate King. Who is...?
This character, often seen with a pinwheel hat, is the adoptive older brother of a Straw Hat crew member and was once a member of the Sun Pirates. Who is...?
